name: CTRify AI SEO Content
author: ExcursionPass Inc.

sections.description:
CTRify WordPress Plugin allows you to generate SEO Optimized Content generated by AI for your websites in seconds! It enables CTRify Platform services on any website powered by WordPress.

Need hundreds of SEO Optimized keyword-rich posts to create internal links to your top money pages to increase their Google rankings? 4 clicks and less than 1 minute.

To generate content with CTRify WordPress Plugin is simple as writing a single keyword. Our AI will learn all about it and generate content according to the selected type of campaign.

Three simple options to get new content quickly:

  • Generate all Questions & Answers around one single keyword
  • Generate Posts by giving a list keywords
  • Generate Long Posts by giving clustered keywords or subtitles

Visit also CTRify WordPress Plugin page for more details about the plugin, options and to get your License Key. You can also create an account on our main platform CTRify SEO Platform and manage your content generation for all your WordPress website using CTRify Plugin from the same interface.

Some Results
sections.installation:
1. Open Plugins – Add New in WP admin and search for “CTRify”
  2. Install and activate the plugin
  3. Plugin settings will open automatically (you can also access them via Settings – CTRify)
  4. Get a License Key on CTRify SEO Plugin page and activate it. You can also create an account on our main platform CTRify SEO Platform and manage your content generation for all your wordpress website using CTRify Plugin from the same interface.

Need support?

We’re here for you! Things get frustrating when they don’t work so make sure you contact us using the contact information inside the plugin or well by open a support topic in the official forum. We answer all questions within a few hours!

Wanna say “thank you”?

The best way to say “thank you” is to leave a review. Reviews are what keeps the plugin going. Thank you!
sections.faq:
Who can I generate the Topical Map?

Topical Maps and high-quality 1000+ words articles covering semantically connected topics can be generated using our WordPress manager inside CTRify SEO Platform .

Who is this plugin for?

For anybody that needs to create keyword-rich content, with the idea of naturally linking internally other “money pages” in order to improve their rankings.

Do I need a powerful server to run this plugin?

No. You can install this plugin on any cheap shared hosting. All the heavy lift is done on our Cloud. The plugin handles the wordpress process of post creation, scheduling and campaigns control. The high demanding and expensive processes are done on our cloud.

After activating CTRify plugin, do I need to do anything else?

Yes, you will need to get one license key and activate that key to fully activate the plugin. Licenses act as secure keys that ensure communications with our servers in order to process the high load processes of the AI work.

How good is the generated Content?

The generated content is as good as other AI content generated by similars AIs, lets say OpenAI GPT-3 or GPT-2. It will never replace a professional copy writer on style. But will for sure surpass human capabilities of research and content creation. Humans may rather prefer human-written content, but for SEO others AIs like Google´s will like our content as well. Ideally is recommended to write as better content as possible in order to convert your visitors to sales, or actions. AI-generated content helps you to start receiving traffic by indexing content faster. But is recommended that you monitor your visits in order to locate the most visited content and optimize it for your desired conversion needs.

sections.reviews:
Helpful time saver

By jjcav84 on November 3, 2023

Awesome plugin. Does what it says it will do. Through the WordPress plugin, I am paying $2 per 1000-word article. Not bad at all!

Pay as you play

By OhSnap on March 18, 2023

I should have done the deep research first. Way too expensive - just pay a pro to write your content. The content isn't king nor is the SEO. Do the research first as I should have done. Learn AI!!!!

Lots of spam

By nllh80 on July 11, 2022

This service is very spammy. Be careful with all the content, they sent unwanted emails too.

Easy

By seoonpage on July 24, 2021

Very easy and cheap, the content that generate the tool is good an original, excellent do evergreen content, I only configure the campaign and press a button.

Excelente

By David Ayala (davidayala) on July 18, 2021

Es un plugin que no puede faltar en tu colección.

Buena experiencia

By diego10ar on July 18, 2021

Sorprendido gratamente. Hasta ahora no había conseguido que ninguna herramienta/plugin me realizase está tarea con un mínimo de calidad/sentido. En este caso todas las campañas realizadas han sido realizadas en segundos y apenas toca pasar revisión. Además al permitir 3 opciones para realizar los textos, da más juego y mayor capacidad de adaptación.

Perfecto plugin para generar texto mediante IA

By bestthony on July 16, 2021

Es un excelente plugin que puede ayudarte a la hora de crear post y evitar tener que buscar tu todos los datos de esa temática. Además es bastante sencillo e intuitivo, dándote varias opciones de creación de post, incluso ponerlo en piloto automático y hacer que él mismo lo postee, coja imágenes de internet o busque la temática. Me parece un acierto de plugin.

short_description: Generate SEO Optimized AI Content from a single keyword or even answering given questions with one-click! Now integrated also with OpenAI.
